targets.rawSql: SELECT count(DISTINCT asin) FROM amazon_reviews.collected_review_data;
SELECT count(reviewID) FROM amazon_reviews.collected_review_data;
SELECT reviewDate, count(reviewID) As "Total Reviews" FROM amazon_reviews.collected_review_data  where asin="B01HTH3C8S" GROUP BY reviewDate;
targets.refId: Amazon Basics Digital Optical Audio Toslink Cable for Sound Bar, TV - 6 Feet (1.8 Meters)

targets.rawSql: SELECT reviewDate, count(reviewID) As "Positive Reviews"  FROM amazon_reviews.collected_review_data  where asin="B01HTH3C8S" AND sentiment = "Positive" GROUP BY reviewDate;
SELECT reviewDate, count(reviewID) As "Other Reviews"  FROM amazon_reviews.collected_review_data  where asin="B01HTH3C8S" AND (sentiment = "Negative" OR sentiment="Neutral") GROUP BY reviewDate;
SELECT sentiment,count(sentiment) FROM amazon_reviews.collected_review_data  where asin="B01HTH3C8S" GROUP BY sentiment;
SELECT sentiment,count(sentiment) FROM amazon_reviews.collected_review_data  where asin="B07CRG94G3" GROUP BY sentiment;
